Su negocio lo desarrolla en la localidad de ‘Vichaya’ localizado a 86 kilómetros de la ciudad y se caracteriza por las importantes estructuras funerarias existentes en el lugar denominadas ‘Chullpares’ y sitios defensivos de la época de los denominados “Señoríos Aymaras” 1100 - 1400 dc., estas chullpas se pueden observar a simple vista desde el camino, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 5-16 grados centígrados.
Evaristo es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que trabaja en el mismo negocio y con sus hijos; el mayor trabaja en el negocio familiar, los 2 hermanos del medio estudian en la escuela y la menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con electricidad y agua de pozo, no existe el alcantarillado en el lugar. Su negocio es la producción de estuco; desde el tratamiento de la roca (el yeso) explotada en estado natural, transformándola en polvo para ser mezclada con agua y aplicada sobre superficies como; muros, cielos rasos y cementos, con la que se pueden hacer rellenos de superficies y revestimiento de acabados de la construcción. “el altiplano es seco y desierto, no existen árboles ni ningún tipo de combustible, por eso debemos comprar leña y combustible para trabajar.” comenta. Su sueño es construir una casa de ladrillo, él desea realizar la compra de leña y combustible para la explotación de estuco. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Evaristo solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña y combustible para la producción de estuco y con los beneficios construir su casa de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Evaristo, 47, is married and has two sons aged 18 and 10 and 2 daughters aged 16 and 4. He has a business producing stucco. 

He is an entrepreneur, a good father, decisive, strong, responsible and hard working. He works in the town of Vichaya, 86km from the city. It is known for the many funerary structures found in the area called "Chullpares" as well as a defensive site during the “Señoríos Aymaras” period in 1100-1400 bc. 

You can see the "Chullpares" from the road. The area has a cold and dry temperature which ranges between 5-16 C [40-60F] during the day. 

Evaristo has a dark complexion, black hair, brown eyes, has a short stature and thin physique. His mother tongue is Aymará which is spoken in the area and he speaks Spanish which is the business language. 

He lives with his wife (who works with him ) and his children. The oldest son works in the family business, the two middle children attend school and the youngest is still not of school age. They live in their own house made of adobe with a tin roof. The house has electricity and well water. There is no sewer system in the area. 

His business produces stucco. They treat the rock (gypsum) in its natural state, transforming it into powder and mix it with water which can then be applied to surfaces such as walls, ceilings and cement in order to make fillers and finishes to constructions. 

"The plateau is dry and dessert like. There are no trees or other fuel types which is why we buy firewood and other types of fuel in order to work" he states. 

His dream is to build a brick house. He wants to buy firewood and fuel in order to produce the stucco. 

This is the second loan in five years that he has been working in this field. Evaristo is requesting a loan to buy firewood and fuel to produce stucco and with the profits build a brick house.

loans.use: to buy firewood and fuel to produce stucco and with the profits build a brick house.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida engages in raising and selling hogs. She is a married woman with two children ages 12 and 14 years old. She has been engaged in the hog raising business for quite a few years. She lives in Talibon, Bohol.

She has requested a loan to buy feed and piglets. These will help improve her hog raising business. She could now raise and sell healthy hogs in the coming months, thus expanding her business and improving the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets.

loans.name: Leslye

texts.es:
Leslye siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una joven soñadora, entregada y perspicaz. Por esto, cuando decidió  que profesión dedicarse no dudo en las Relaciones Internacionales. Ella con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación concluyó sus estudios universitarios, sin embargo, aún no ha sacado su título. 
Por ello, solicita el financiamiento para pagar los gastos del curso de graduación y los tramites del título. Lo que le ayudará  a conseguir mejores oportunidades de empleo y en consiguiente podrá desarrollarse como profesional.  Entre los planes de Leslye esta ahorrar para compra su casa de habitación.
texts.en: Leslye has always been thought of as a dreamer, devoted and perceptive. So when she was deciding what profession to take there was no doubt that it was International Relations. With much effort and dedication she has concluded her university studies but has not yet gotten her degree. For this reason she is requesting a loan to pay the cost of her graduation course and the fees to obtain her degree. This will help her find better employment opportunities and consequently be able to develop as a professional. Amongst Leslye's plans is to save to buy her house.

loans.use: to pay the expenses of her graduating courses and the fees to obtain her degree.

loans.name: Jose Florentino

texts.es: José de 58 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 21 y 34 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que desde hace 35 años se dedica a cultivar la tierra actividad que aprendió de su padre y que le permite tener maíz, frijol y hortalizas para comercializar y para el consumo propio, lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia. José desea construir un cuarto para la cocina, ya que como se observa en la fotografía actualmente se encuentra protegida con una galera, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, lámina y hierro para construir un cuarto para la cocina en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jose is 58 years old. He is an industrious man who lives in his own house with his wife and two children, who are 21 and 34 years old. 

He is a hard-worker, who has been farming for 35 years, a living he learned from his father and one that allows him to have corn, beans, and vegeatables to sell and for his own consumption. This allows him to support his family. 

Jose would like to build a room for his kitchen, since, as you can see in the photo, it is currently only protected by a roof. He is requesting a FUSAI loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, cement blocks, metal sheets and iron to build a room for the kitchen in his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, cement blocks, metal sheets and iron to build a room for the kitchen in his house

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is a 28-year-old married man from Rafah city. He lives with his wife in a small, humble house. Bilal works in a store for selling home appliances. He is also a student in a local university, where he studies business administration.

Bilal took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. This will help him to do his homework and write the reports easily.

Bilal appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Carmen Isabel

texts.es: Carmen de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de especies de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, tiene 12 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Carmen está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como: achiote, canela, ajonjolí, pimienta, canela, etc. para continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Carmen is 55 year old and lives in her own house with her daughter. She works selling spices itinerantly in the different markets that are close to her house. She has been dong this for 12 years and with what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. Carmen is requesting a loan to buy more products like achiote, cinnamon, sesame seeds, pepper, etc to continues her sales and have higher income.

loans.use: to buy more products like achiote, cinnamon, sesame seeds, pepper, etc.

loans.name: Scolar

texts.en:
Ten years ago, Scolar started farming on a small inherited piece of land in Kabichoi, a remote village in the Thika area of Kenya. Today, this humble mother of three children sells milk, eggs and a variety of food crops. She is a passionate farmer and, because of the immense knowledge she has on farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village. 

Dairy farming is close to her heart, and every day she wakes up to milk her cow, and that makes her very proud. Although she makes profits through milk selling, she lacks a proper dairy unit, and she is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan, she will have a humble time milking her cow and also feeding it. 

A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevents them from getting diseases that may arise because of being exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain. 

Scolar believes that, through this loan, her living conditions will change because she is going to have an increase in milk production. She will save money that she used to spend on treating her cows because she lacked a good dairy unit. Scolar waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to build a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Nelson Max

texts.es:
Nelson es un hombre de 37 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos varones de 6, 4 y 2 años, y su negocio es la confección de prendas deportivas.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, constante, paciente, responsable  y trabajador. su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘cruce villa Adela’ un área caracterizada por conectar a varias zonas de la ciudad, dónde el transporte público tiene paradas, desde este lugar las personas se pueden movilizar a otras zonas alejadas, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Nelson es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español para el comercio. Su negocio es la confección de chamarras de dama y se especializa en buzos deportivos juveniles para la venta por mayor. Él se encarga de comprar telas de diferentes colores y texturas para confeccionar chamarras de dama de toda talla, también recibe pedidos y confecciona buzos deportivos juveniles. Su experiencia en el negocio comenzó cuando trabajaba como ayudante para luego independizarse y ser su propio jefe. Sus inicios fueron trabajando con una máquina casera de costura, la cual sigue funcionando, él desea incrementar su producción y realizar mayor cantidad de prendas porque tiene clientes continuos que le exigen mayores cantidades. “hace 3 años viajé a Brasil y trabajé como costurero, adquirí nuevos conocimientos y experiencia para independizarme y abrir mi propio negocio…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes fijos y constantes para la venta de ropa por mayor, la desventaja es que no cuenta con capital suficiente para realizar la compra de tela por mayor. Su sueño es tener una fábrica de confecciones y producir a gran escala. Él necesita realizar la compra de telas; micro polar por rollo para lograr cumplir con sus pedidos. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que inició su negocio.
 Es por esos motivos que Nelson solicita un préstamo para la compra de telas por rollo para cumplir con sus pedidos y ampliar su negocio de confección
texts.en:
Nelson is a 37-year-old man, who is married, has 3 children (6, 4 and 2 years old), and his business makes sports clothes.

Nelson is enterprising, independent, constant, patient, responsible and hard-working. His business is located in the Cruce Villa Adela zone, an area characterized by its connections to various zones of the city, where public transport has stops. From here, people can travel to other outlying zones. The climate is cold, with a temperature that varies during the day between 2 and 14 degrees centigrade.

Nelson is dark-complected, with dark eyes and short black hair. His stature is short and he is slender. His native tongue is Aymara, which he speaks among his family, and he speaks Spanish in conducting commerce. He makes course clothing for women and specializes in juvenile sports clothes to sell at wholesale. He has to buy cloth in different colors and textures to make this course clothing for women in all sizes. Also, he takes orders and makes sports clothing for juveniles. 

His experience in the business began when he worked as an assistant, and later, Nelson became independent and his own boss. He began working with a household sewing machine, which is still functioning. Nelson wishes to expand production, making a larger quantity of items because he has continuing customers who are demanding larger quantities: He comments, “Some three years ago, I visited Brazil and worked as a tailor, acquiring new knowledge and experience, in order to become independent and open my own business.”

The advantage of his business is that he can count on fixed and constant customers to sell his clothing to at wholesale. The disadvantage is that he lacks sufficient capital to purchase cloth at wholesale.

Nelson's dream is to have a clothing factory and produce on a grand scale. He needs to purchase micro-polar cloth by the roll to be able to comply with customer orders. This is his first loan cycle with our institution in the four years since launching his company.
 
It is for these motives that Nelson is requesting a loan to purchase clothing by the roll in order to comply with customer orders and expand his clothing-making business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth by the roll at wholesale to comply with customer orders and to expand his clothing-making business.

loans.name: Los Hijos De Dios Group

texts.es:
Gabriela es una mujer de 26 años de edad, soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 10, 3 años y un bebé de 9 meses, su negocio es la venta de fideo.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, de buen trato, generosa, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la localidad de ‘el Torno’ situado a 32 kilómetros de la ciudad, caracterizada por su topografía cubierta por vegetación tropical, es dueña de una gran riqueza forestal y diversidad de fauna silvestre. Es el lugar de reunión  de campesinos dónde sacan su cosecha para vender. Su principal actividad económica es la agropecuaria, de clima cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante el die entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Gabriela es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, estatura mediana complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que realiza (sentada usa polera amarilla). Su necesidad de mejorar su negocio la llevo a reunir a microempresarios y formar una banca de personas con negocios como; taller de llaves, venta de jugos, llantería, venta de empanadas, venta de blusas de mujer, venta de comida y venta de verduras, para solicitar un préstamo y generar mejores ingresos. Su negocio es la reposición de fideo; ella se encarga de visitar tiendas y comercios para reponer su stock de fideo, como; tallarines, moño, cabellos de ángel, macarrones y otras variedades. “inicié mi negocio como reponedora de fideo, me encargo de abastecer las tiendas repartiendo este producto alimenticio…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que ya tiene rutas establecidas y clientes constantes, la desventaja es que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar fideo por mayor y repartir a todos sus clientes. Su sueño es que sus hijos estudien una carrera profesional, ella desea realizar la compra de fideo por mayor para distribuir en las tiendas y reponer el stock de sus stands.
Es por esos motivos que Gabriela solicita un préstamo para la compra de fideo por mayor para distribuir en las tiendas y reponer el stock de todos sus clientes.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a 26 year old single mother who has 3 children aged 10 and 3 and a 9 month baby. Her business is selling pasta. She is a good mother, enterprising, with good manners, generous, responsible and hard-working.

Her business takes place in el Torno’, which is situated 32 km from the city and characterized by land covered with tropical vegetation. It has a great abundance of forests and a diversity of fauna. It is the meeting place for farmers who come to sell their produce. The principal activity is agriculture. It has a hot, wet tropical climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 21 to 35 degrees Celsius.

Gabriela is dark-skinned, dark eyes, long black hair tat she ties back, medium height and thin. Her native language is Guaraní and she speaks Spanish because of the general culture and for the work she does (she is seated wearing the yellow shirt). The need to improve her business led her to meet with other micro-entrepreneurs and form a communal bank with people with businesses like: a key cutter, selling juice, a tire shop, selling empanadas, the sales of blouses for women, food sales, the sale of vegetables, to request a loan and generate more income.

Her business is the distribution of pasta. she is in charge of visiting stores and businesses to fill their stock of noodles like spaghetti, macaronis and other varieties. "I started my business as a re-supplier of pasta, I take care of supplying the stores distributing this food product" she commented. Her advantage is that she already has set routes and regular customers and her disadvantage is that she does not have enough capital to buy past wholesale to distribute it to all her customers.

Her dream is for her children to study a profession. She wants to be able to buy pasta wholesale to distribute to the stores and re-stock their selves. For these reasons Gabriela is requesting a loan to buy pasta wholesale and distribute it to stores and replenish the stock of all her customers.

loans.use: to buy pasta wholesale to distribute to stores and stock all her clients.

loans.name: Mahabat

texts.ru: Махабат 35 лет, замужем, 2 детей. Образование у Махабат средне-специальное, по профессии она повар. С 2001 года она занимается сельским хозяйством - животноводством и полеводством, благодаря ее большому опыту и неустанному труду, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Махабат есть 7 коров, 15 овец. Она выращивает на2,0 Га арендованной и 0,6 Га собственной земли люцерну и ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно она реализует молоко местным жителям. Ежемесячный доход Махабат составляет около 16,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 бычков и заготовку сена для скота. Доходы от кредита Махабат планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение ее бизнеса и хочет приобрести автомобиль для семьи.
texts.en:
Mahabat is 35 years old, married, and has two children.  Mahabat has a specialized secondary level education and is a cook by trade.  Since 2001 she has been in the farming and cattle business, and as a result of her wealth of experience and unceasing work, today she has seven cows and 15 sheep.  She also owns 0.6 ha of land and rents another 2 ha where she grows alfalfa and barley both for feed and for sale.  She also sells milk to people in her village.  Mahabat's monthly income comes to about 16,800 som (KGS).

With the goal of further developing her business, Mahabat applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy three steers and hay for her cattle.  Mahabat plans to invest the profits from her loan in expanding her business.  She also wants to buy a vehicle for her family.

loans.use: to buy three steers and hay for livestock

loans.name: Yana

texts.en:
This pretty and beautiful lady’s name is Yana, and she lives with her parents and grandfather in the frontier village of Achajur of the Tavush region. 

Yana has a vocational education and a specialty of apothecary, but she did not manage to find some proper work in her specialty. That is why she is seriously engaged in farming and agriculture with her parents. She mentions that thanks to her father, she became very interested in swine breeding, and with him, she hopes to develop it on their farm. With her mother, she also takes care of their big and colorful orchard; they have apple, persimmon, nut, fig and mulberry trees. All the harvest of the orchard she sells with her father at the city’s wholesale market.

Yana hopes that thanks to Kiva lenders’ support, she will manage to enrich their farm; she wants to buy piglets and fodder for the whole farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy piglets and fodder for the farm cattle

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 32 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Айнуры среднее образование, в качестве основного источника дохода для семьи, она работает санитаром, также занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав бизнес 15 лет назад. На данный момент в хозяйстве Айнуры имеется 3 коровы, 14 овец. На 1,0 Га земли она выращивает люцерну. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнура обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота и ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Ainura is 32 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  Ainura has a secondary level education and her family's main income is from her job as a hospital orderly.  She also has an agricultural business that she started 15 years ago.  Currently, Ainura has three cows and 14 sheep.  She also grows alfalfa on 1.0 ha of land.

With an aim to further developing her business, Ainura applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep for fattening and resale. Ainura plans to invest the profits from her loan in more cattle and in doing home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Zinagul

texts.ru: Зинагул 41 год, вдова, мать 4 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи уже много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Зинагул, на сегодняшний день у нее есть земельный надел мерою 2,0 ГА, где она выращивает люцерну. В хозяйстве также есть 3 коровы, 5 овец. Зинагул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для закупки овец для откорма. Зинагул намерена накопить средства на обучение ее детей.
texts.en:
Zinagul is 41 years old, a widow, and the mother of four children.  She has a secondary level education and her family's main income is from the farming and cattle business she has had for many years.  Thanks to her perseverance, ambition, and industriousness, today Zinagul has 2.0 ha of land where she raises alfalfa.  She also has three cows and five sheep.

Zinagul applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep for fattening up and resale.  Zinagul's intention is to save up money for her children's educations.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Fatoumata's Group

texts.fr: Fatoumata qui se trouve sur la photo au deuxième rang à droite, et qui tient la corde du drapeau de MyAgro avec sourire, est membre d’un groupe de 6 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro qui vivent et travaillent dans le village de Djiguidala au sud-ouest de Bamako au Mali. Fatoumata, âgée de 34 ans, est la mère de 2 enfants âgés de 5 à 9 ans, et dont l'un d’entre eux est actuellement scolarisé. La rentabilité de l'arachide a incité Fatoumata à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 20 ans. Fatoumata cultive l'arachide sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles. Fatoumata entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro et des formations et techniques agricoles . Cette année Fatoumata effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.0625 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 20 ans que Fatoumata cultive l'arachide. Fatoumata planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu d'acheter un semoir . Enfin Fatoumata espère aussi pouvoir couvrir les frais de scolarité de son enfant.
texts.en: Fatoumata, who is on the right of the second row of women in the photo and who is pulling on the myAfgro flag's cord with a smile, is a member of a group of six farmers who are registered with myAgro and live and work in the village of Djiguidala, south west of Bamako in Mali. Fatoumata is 34 years old and mother to two children, aged five and nine years old, one of whom is currently at school. The profitability of groundnut farming has encouraged Fatoumata to carry out this activity for the past 20 years. She grows groundnut on her own plot of land, but as a farmer, is faced with difficulties such as the lack of farming materials. She has begun her first year with myAgro and signed up because of the possibility of increasing her yield through the services offered by myAgro and through training and farming techniques. This year Fatoumata has been making payments to buy a packet of OPV seeds and fertilizer for growing groundnut, so she can increase the yield from her 0.0625 hectare plot of land. Fatoumata has been growing groundnut for 20 years now and is planning, with the increase of her yield and her income to buy a drilling machine. Finally, she also hopes to be able to cover her child's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a packet of fertilizer and OPV seeds for growing groundnut.

loans.name: Eva Alejandrina

texts.es: Eva de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y sus cuatro nietos, ella se  dedica a la venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su hija logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  maíz por quintales y cal y asi poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Eva is 62 years old and owns her own home, where she lives with her daughter and four grandchildren. She makes a living selling tortillas from her home, and is able to meet part of her household budget with her business income. She is applying or a loan to purchase several quintals of corn and and lime so she can continue to run the business and earn a steady income.

loans.use: to purchase several quintals of corn as well as lime.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: René de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de muebles, tiene 20 años de dedicarse al negocio y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la  compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz, junco y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
René is 58 years old, married, lives with his wife, and  has a carpentry workshop where makes a variety of furniture for a living. He's been in business for 20 years and has a large customer base, so his sales meet some of his household expenses. 

René is applying for a loan for the purchase of wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds, and other items he needs to attract more customers. The investments that René makes with this loan will thus help him achieve his goal of improving his quality of life.

loans.use: purchase of wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds, and other items.

loans.name: Claudia Ivonne

texts.es: Claudia de 42 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 11 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia,  con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para seguir con sus ventas y poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Claudia is 42 years and is a single mother who lives in her own house with her two children. She has worked for the past 11 years selling tortillas. Her business is located at her house and with what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy corn by the quintal and lime to continue with her sales and be able to have more income.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime.

loans.name: Jose Del Transito

texts.es: Jose de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijo, el se dedica a la instalación de cielo falso, puertas par baños, ventanas etc. se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 8 años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza su trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales como hierro, cielo falso, balcones, vidrio para puertas, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his three children. He makes a living in the installation of false ceiling, bathroom doors, windows, etc. He has been working in this activity for 8 years, and has many customers for the quality with which he does his work. With what he gets from his job he manages to solve the various household expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy materials such as iron, false ceiling, balconies, glass doors, etc., so he can continue with his work which generates good profits.

loans.use: to buy materials such as iron, false ceiling, balconies, glass doors, etc.

loans.name: Hanane

texts.en:
Hanane is a 49-year-old, married mother of five children attending school. To better support her husband, she has been working since three years ago selling homemade food. She opened her own shop in order to help her family to meet the needs of life and live in a good way. 

Today, Hanane is asking a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l.. to ameliorate her business merchandise and to renovate her shop with the aim to give the best product to its clients, and therefore, increase her income. She is very happy and optimistic that she will sell all the products and expand her business area.

loans.use: to ameliorate her business merchandise and to renovate her shop

loans.name: Matil

texts.en:
Matil is a 57-year-old, widowed mother of three children who started five years ago selling accessories and perfumes from her house to cover the needs and expenses of her beloved kids. She is a hard worker and an ambitious lady who is developing her business year after year. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with new requested perfumes and accessories items which will satisfy her customers' needs.

Matil hopes to expand her business more in the future through opening her own shop to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with new requested perfumes and accessories items

loans.name: Gulnoza

texts.en:
Gulnoza is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1983. She is living in a small village. She is married and has four children. She has higher education and works as a teacher in a secondary school. Her husband is a doctor in a medical clinic. 

Gulnoza has a business of agriculture and plants cereals. Unfortunately, the season was less rainy and she could not gain a harvest. 

She likes to do the business in agriculture. She wanted to buy cattle and feed her children with fresh and natural milk. Gulnoza did not have enough money to buy cattle; she asks for a loan from Kiva lenders. She hopes to be supported and have a permanent activity.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is 30 years old, and he lives with his wife and two children in Ijevan city of Tavush region. It is already nine years that Karen has had his own business, which already once has been supported by Kiva and Nor Horizon.

At the city’s wholesale market, Karen sells flowers and bouquets made from them, and he also has a coffee grinder and sells ground coffee, and lately he also started the sale of mushrooms. Karen mentions that as before, the main financial income of his family comes from the sale of coffee and now also from mushrooms. The sale of flowers he says he made smaller.

Karen greatly hopes that his second loan will help him to develop his business more. He greatly wants to keep it, as during past years he did his best not to lose it despite financial crisis and hardships that he regularly has to overcome.

He will use this loan for the purchase of a lot of coffee, mushrooms, and also a small portion of flowers.

loans.use: purchase a lot of coffee, mushrooms, and also a small portion of flowers.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 32-year-old, hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in livestock as his main source of income and does farming, where he earns an extra income. He had intentions of educating his children, and that’s why he started this business. He hopes to become a modernized farmer; however, his main challenge is the price fluctuations of his products. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more cows for his farm.

loans.use: to buy more cows for his farm.

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent is a fifty-two-year-old hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda.

He deals in farming as his main source of income alongside waragi (a local brew) brewing to earn him an extra income. He hopes to own a big farm; however, his main challenge is poor climatic changes.

He is requesting a loan to buy manure, seedlings, and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.use: to buy manure, seedlings, and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.name: Lyova

texts.en:
Lyova lives with his elderly retired mother, wife, and two school-age children. Lyova is the only breadwinner in the family and has been involved in the construction business for already six years. Over those years of hard work, Lyova was able to have a good client base and manages to have several orders during the month.

Lyova mainly provides interior construction of buildings. The lack of working tools is a big problem for Lyova. He asks for this loan to purchase a rotary hammer drill needed for providing construction work in a more efficient way.

Lyova's loan has been approved within the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

Lyova hopes to receive lenders' support to be able to continue providing construction work and gather more income for his family's living.

loans.use: to pay for a rotary hammer drill needed for providing construction work to complete current orders and receive income for his family.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.pt:
O senhor Eusébio de 46 anos de idade, pai de 7 filhos, dos quais 3 são técnicos e 4 frequentando o ensino secundário.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar cimento, areia, ferros, chapas, barrotes, porta,pregos e arrame.
O cliente tem como sonhos,concluir a sua casa e construir uma barraca.
Tem como principais desafios os financeiros pelo que tem recorrido ao xitique familiar para se capitalizar e pretende tomar mais credito para suprir as suas dificuldades.
texts.en:
Eusébio is 46 years old and has seven children, three of whom are workers and four of whom are in high school.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sand, rebar, sheet metal, beams, a door, nails, and wire.
His biggest dream is to finish the construction on his home.
His major challenges are financial ones; he has relied on his communal bank and plans to take out more loans to overcome his difficulties.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, rebar, sheet metal, beams, a door, nails, and wire.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.pt:
A senhora Sofia de 33 anos de idade é solteira  mãe de 1 filho ainda menor de idade é trabalhadora e vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar blocos, cimento, pedra, areia branca e incomate,  para dar continuidade da sua obra.
Tem como sonho, concluir a sua casa para oferecer  melhor comodidade a sua família, e comprar um carro para o seu dia-a-dia.

Os principais desafios são financeiros e para supri-los ira reembolsar sem entrar em moras e tomar mais emprestimos.
texts.en:
Sofia, 33 years old, is a single mother with one young son. She is a worker and lives in her own home.
She will use this loan to buy cinder blocks, cement, stone, white sand, and other construction materials to continue the work on her house.
Her dream is to finish her house so she can offer her family a better life, and to buy a car for daily life.
Her main challenges are financial ones, and she plans to overcome them by paying off her loan on time and applying for additional loans.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, stone, white sand, and other construction materials to continue the work on her house.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Monicah. She is 52 years old, married and living with her husband and her seven children. She is a mixed farmer and grows potatoes, maize and beans. She has applied for a loan to buy fertilizer and certified seeds so that she can increase her production, hence earning more income to enable her to pay for her children's tuition fees.

She is grateful to Kiva and her lenders for the financial support.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and certified seeds to increase her production, hence earning more income to enable her to pay for her children's tuition fees.

loans.name: Dairon

texts.es:
Dairon es un hombre de 31 años de edad, se dedica atender una salsamentaría donde oferta servicios de bebidas alcohólicas, papas en bolsa, mecatos, juegos de billar, cartas y domino.
Con su negocio ha logrado levantar y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia que la constituye dos hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad y se proyecta para seguir creciendo y en un futuro generar empleo, comprar vivienda, darles la educación a sus hijos y ser lo suficiente para no dejar pasar a sus hijos necesidades.
En la foto podemos ver la necesidad y motivo por el que Dairon solicita un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de surtido de papas en bolsa, refrescos, cerveza, e implementos para limpiar sus mesas de billar.
texts.en:
Dairon is 31 years old and earns a living working in a pub where he offers alcoholic drinks, bags of chips and pastries as well as games of pool, cards and dominos. 
With his business he has managed to increase and improve the quality of life of his family which is made up of two children who are 10 and 8 years old. He protects his business in order to continue growing and so that in the future he can create employment, buy a home, give his children education and for it to be enough to give them what they need.
In the photo, the need and reason for which Dairon is asking for a loan can be seen. He will invest it in buying stock such as bags of chips, soft drinks, beer and tools for cleaning his pool tables.

loans.use: to stock up his business with bags of chips, sweets, products to clean his pool tables and to change the pool balls.

loans.name: Victória

texts.pt:
A senhora Victóra de 35 anos de idade é mãe de 4 filhos, dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino técnico, 2 estão no ensino secundário e 1 no primário. 
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar cebola, tomate, cerveja, doces, sabão e óleo para revender.
Tem como sonho,ampliar o seu negócio e se casar.
Os principais desafios são financeiros e tem recorrido ao trabalho e ao xitique para suprir as suas necessidades. Pretende tomar mais crédito para ajudar a suprir as suas dificuldades.
texts.en:
Victória is 35 years old. She has four children, one of whom is a worker, two of whom are in high school, and one of whom is in elementary school.
She will use this loan to buy onions, tomatoes, beer, sweets, soap, and oil to resell.
Her dream is to expand her business and get married.
Her major challenges are financial. She relies on her work and the communal bank to meet her needs. She plans to take out more loans to help overcome her difficulties.

loans.use: to buy onions, tomatoes, beer, sweets, soap, and oil to resell.

loans.name: Alcinda

texts.pt:
A senhora Alcinda de 35 anos de idade é solteira  mãe de 1 filho, este que se encontra a frequentar o ensino primário e vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, óleo, açúcar, arroz, feijão, manteiga, peixe, fraldas, omo, colgate, caldos, sumos, refrigerantes, sabão bingo para reforçar o seu negocio.
Tem como sonho, ampliar o seu negocio e responder as necessidades dos seus clientes, e comprar um carro para lhe facilitar no negocio.
Os principais desafios são financeiros e tem recorrido ao seu negocio para os supri-los. Pretende tomar mais emprestimos para concretizar seus planos
texts.en:
Alcinda is 35 years old and the single mother of one son who is in elementary school. She lives in her own home.
She will use this loan to buy oil, sugar, rice, beans, butter, fish, eggs, broth, juice, soft drinks, soap, and other products to stock her business.
Her dream is to expand her business and meet her customers' needs, and to buy a car to use in her business.
Her main challenges are financial ones, and she relies on her business to overcome them. She will request more loans in the future to carry out her plans.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, rice, beans, butter, fish, eggs, broth, juice, soft drinks, soap, and other products to stock her business.

loans.name: Judite

texts.pt:
A senhora Judite tem 33 anos de idade, é casada, mãe de 1 filho ainda menor e vive na casa própria.Alem do filho vive com 2 sobrinhas frequentando o ensino secundário.
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar chapas de zinco, blocos, ferros e cimento.
Seus sonhos e esperança para o futuro são ver seu negócio a crescer e adiquirir uma viatura para o uso pessoal.
Diz que tem como desafio a insuficiência de   fundos  e para ultrapassar esta situação faz uma poupança e que irá solicitar mais créditos para concretizar o seu plano.
texts.en:
Judite is 33 years old and married. She has one young son and lives in her own home. She also has two nieces who live with her and attend high school.
She says she will use this loan to buy sheet metal, cinder blocks, rebar, and cement.
Her dreams for the future are to see her business grow and to acquire a vehicle for personal use.
She says a lack of capital is her biggest challenge. To overcome this difficulty, she is saving money and will request more loans to carry out her plans.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, cinder blocks, rebar, and cement.

loans.name: Lidia Nohemy

texts.es: Lidia de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 3 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su hermana logran salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lidia is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her sister.  For 3 years she has had a little store located in her home.  She has many customers due to her good prices. With what she gets from her sales and with the help of her sister, she succeeds in supporting herself.

She is asking for a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread etc. and thus be able to have better earnings for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread etc.
